songs.title: Aiight
songs.lyrics:
It's that heartbreak, that smart break that copa
Drinkin hard liquor, drinkin dark, VSOP straight
And they love it when we pull up me and all my gang
I got hoes tell the homies send the address where we stay
It's that heartbreak, that smart break that cvopa
Drinkin hard liquor, drinkin dark, VSOP straight
And they love it when we pull up me and all my gang
I got hoes tell the homies send the address where we stay
It's that heartbreak, that smart break that cvopa
Drinkin hard liquor, drinkin dark, VSOP straight
And they love it when we pull up me and all my gang
I got hoes tell the homies send the address where we stay
It's that heartbreak, that smart break that cvopa
Drinkin hard liquor, drinkin dark, VSOP straight
And they love it when we pull up me and all my gang
I got hoes tell the homies send the address where we stay
